import sys

MAX_LEN = 1000

trees = [0] * (MAX_LEN + 1)

# Base cases
trees[1] = 1
trees[2] = 1

for j in xrange(3 , MAX_LEN + 1):
  count = 0
  for k in xrange(1, j):
    count += trees[k] * trees[j-k]
  count %= 10000
  trees[j] = count

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
for i in xrange(n):
  m = int(sys.stdin.readline())
  print trees[m] % 10000
